section.heading: Inspector of Elevators and Fire Escapes.
section.text: One of the Assistant Inspectors of Buildings shall hereafter also perform the duties of Inspector of Elevators and Fire Escapes, without additional compensation.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Elevators, regulation of construction, repair and operation, see § 1-303.44.

annoGroup.heading: New Implementing Regulations
annoGroup.annotation: New implementing regulations: Pursuant to this section, the following new regulations were adopted in 1984: The “Apartment House Elevator Act of 1984” (D.C. Law 5-132, Mar. 13, 1985, 32 DCR 1717).
